description: Holistic rubric for complete short stories

levels.4: Clear beginning, middle, and end that flow together naturally
levels.3: All three parts present and recognizable
levels.2: One part is missing or underdeveloped
levels.1: Story structure is unclear or missing multiple parts

feedback_stems.strength: Your story has a clear beginning, middle, and end
feedback_stems.growth: Make sure your story has all three parts: beginning (who and where), middle (the problem), end (how it's solved)

levels.4: Character is interesting and we understand their feelings throughout
levels.3: Character is present and we know some things about them
levels.2: Character exists but is flat or confusing

feedback_stems.strength: Your character felt real when you showed
feedback_stems.growth: Help readers know your character better by showing how they feel

levels.4: Story includes vivid details that help readers see, hear, and feel the story
levels.3: Some good details that add to the story
levels.2: Few details; story tells but doesn't show much

feedback_stems.strength: Your details helped me picture the story, like when you wrote
feedback_stems.growth: Add words that help readers see, hear, smell, or feel what's happening

levels.4: Complete sentences; spelling doesn't get in the way of reading
levels.3: Most sentences complete; most words spelled correctly
levels.2: Some incomplete sentences or spelling errors that slow reading
levels.1: Many incomplete sentences; spelling makes it hard to read

feedback_stems.strength: Your sentences were easy to read
feedback_stems.growth: Remember to check that each sentence has a complete thought
